DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , single-arm study ass safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics Endostar subcutaneous injection Chinese advance NSCLC patient .
DOC.criteria: Histological/cytological confirm unresectable stage ⅢB～Ⅳ nonsquamous NSCLC ECOG performance status 01 Life expectancy≥3 month Adequate hematologic function : WBC≥3.0×109/L , ANC≥1.5×10^9/L , Hb≥90g/L , PLT≥100×10^9/L ; Adequate hepatic renal function : ALT≤2.5×ULN , AST≤2.5×ULN , TBIL≤1.5×ULN , creatinine≤1×ULN , creatinine clearance≥50ml/min ; Normal coagulation function ( PT , APTT , TT , Fbg ) ; Patients sign informed consent form ; Willingness capability comply protocol requirement well communicate investigator . With uncontrolled ascites pleural effusion ; Patients receive chest abdominal surgery within 28 day enrollment ; fully heal surgical incision ; expect receive surgery study ; History ischemic TIA within 6 month enrollment ; Uncontrolled hypertension , hypertensive crisis hypertensive encephalopathy ; Arrhythmias need treat ; history coronary artery disease ( include angina pectoris myocardial infarction ) ischemic myocardium ; congestive heartfailure NYHA class ≥ II； Serious active infection ; History abdominal fistula , gastrointestinal perforation , abdominal abscess within 6 month prior enrollment ; Symptomatic brain meningeal metastasis ; Epileptic seizure need treat ; HCV , HBV HIV positive ; History malignant tumor within 5 year ( except curable cervix carcinoma situ skin basal cell carcinoma ) ; Known allergy excipient study drug ; Any condition may interfere patient 's participation study impact assessment result study ; Any condition may endanger patient safety interfere patient 's compliance ; Pregnant lactate woman ; The investigator consider patient unsuitable trial
